text: Suchindram Railway Station (Station code: SCH) is found between Thiruvananthapuram-Nagercoil-Kanyakumari railway line. The station has one platform and falls on the Kanyakumari--Thiruvananthapuram line in the Thiruvananthapuram division of the Southern Railway zone. At present no trains halt at this station. Category:Railway stations in Kanyakumari district
title: Suchindram railway station
